p: Initially, the MBC of the test compounds and ampicillin was determined. Then the bacteria ( E. coli, X. oryzae & Staphylococcus) were treated with test compounds at MBC values. At regular time intervals, aliquots of treated culture were drawn, diluted appropriately and plated on nutrient agar/sucrose peptone agar for colony development. The number of colonies was counted, and the number of viable cells was estimated.
